name: Grizzle
slogan: We Help B2B Organizations Grow Traffic & Lead Generation with Content Marketing
description:
We help MarTech, B2B and SaaS companies supercharge traffic and lead generation using a value-driven content strategy. From research, content production, distribution and optimization -- we take care of the entire content marketing ecosystem.

We've worked with companies like Web.com, Pipedrive, Acquisio, Unmetric, Belly Inc., ReferralCandy, and Fuze to name a few.

Services include: Content strategy, content creation, customer development & research, content distribution, content optimization, influencer marketing, SEO, digital PR, lead magnets, podcasts, social media automation and personal branding

Read about our methodology here: https://www.grizzle.io/services

jobs.title: B2B Content Writer
jobs.description:
Grizzle is a content marketing agency, helping SaaS and technology companies create and distribute actionable and value-driven content. Our goal is to help clients surpass their traffic, lead generation and growth goals using a proven content marketing methodology.

About the job:

We’re looking for talented content writers to work with us on an ongoing basis. We’ll provide you with a steady stream of interesting work, a process to empower you to write the best content and ongoing support.

Here’s what you’ll be doing:

- Researching topics and audience challenges
- Writing engaging, practical and informative content
- Collect supporting imagery to illustrate your content (screenshots, graphs etc.)

We’re looking for a content marketer who:

- Loves creating actionable, in-depth content on a range of topics
- Strives to create the best piece of content available on a topic
- Can write in a clear, concise manner
- Understands SEO and what makes educational and value-driven content
- Is extremely well organized and can work to deadlines
- Can communicate in a consistent and reliable manner

Benefits of working with us:

- Long-term, steady and reliable freelance retainer
- Learn about content marketing
- Work with some cool companies in various industries
- Access to awesome people
- Improve your own marketing skills

You’ll work closely with and learn from a sophisticated content marketing methodology. If you’re looking to up your marketing game, you’ll get to see how we create great content and rub shoulders with some known names in the industry.

Interested? Apply here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdaiA5Xa5qyUpMzzBA17WRSoCdo72FDYb6UEs0fZBXfOxPrmg/viewform
